channel.title: Unable to route kicksecure vm traffic trough whonix gateway
channel.description: For testing purposes id like to route the traffic of the kicksecure virtual machine traffic trough the whonix gateway. In all other VMs i change the ipv4 to manual address: 10.152.152.12 Netmask:255.255.192.0 Gateway: 10.152.152.10 DNS: 10.152.152.10 And it works just fine, however when i do the same in a kicksecure VM....crickets. What am i doing wrong my duck search didnt provide any workarounds.

item.title: Unable to route kicksecure vm traffic trough whonix gateway
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Kicksecure at time of writing uses NetworkManger.
Not ifupdown. Therefore not file /etc/network/interfaces.

Confirm your network settings.

sudo ifconfig

Read full topic
item.source: Unable to route kicksecure vm traffic trough whonix gateway
